text: Oni sprashivayut tebya o chase: kogda on brosit yakor'? Skazhi: "Znaniye o nem - u moyego Gospoda, v svoye vremya otkroyet yego tol'ko On. Tyazhek on na nebesakh i na zemle. Pridet on k vam tol'ko vnezapno". Sprashivayut oni tebya, kak budto by ty osvedomlen o nem. Skazhi: "Znaniye o nem - tol'ko u Allakha, no bol'shaya chast' lyudey ne znayet
